title: Google Chrome security advisory (AV25-116)
description: On March 4, 2025, Google published a security advisory to address vulnerabilities in the following products:
products: Stable Channel Chrome for Desktop   versions prior to 134.0.6998.35/36 (Windows), 134.0.6998.44/45 (Mac) and 134.0.6998.35 (Linux)
Extended Stable Channel   versions prior to 134.0.6998.36 (Windows) and 134.0.6998.45 (Mac)
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
